Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 287 Filed 05/20/21 Page 16 of 16

CERTIFICATE OF SERVICE

I hereby certify that on March 15, 2021, I served by email, pursuant Rule 2(B) of the Court's individual practices in criminal cases, the within memorandum and any accompanying exhibits upon the following:

Maurene Comey
Alison Moe
Lara Pomerantz
Andrew Rohrbach
U.S. Attorney's Office, SDNY
One Saint Andrew's Plaza
New York, NY 10007
Maurene.comey@usdoj.gov
Alison.moe@usdoj.gov
Lara.Pomerantz@usdoj.gov
Andrew.Rohrbach@usdoj.gov

/s/ Christian Everdell

DOJ-OGR-00004243

additional_notes: The document appears to be a Certificate of Service, filed on May 20, 2021, as part of a criminal case. It certifies that a memorandum and accompanying exhibits were served via email to the listed recipients on March 15, 2021. The document is signed by Christian Everdell.
